documentation.title: Āwhina me te Tuhinga
documentation.subtitle: Kimihia ngā aratohu me ngā rauemi hei āwhina i a koe ki te whakamahi pai i a Contentry. Kōwhiria he aratohu e rite ana ki tō tūranga.

whatsNew.title: He aha ngā mea hou
whatsNew.description: Kua kitea aunoa ngā whakahōutanga me ngā āhuatanga hou kua tāpirihia ki te pūhara
whatsNew.subtitle: Kua kitea aunoatia ngā huringa me ngā whakahōutanga ki te tūāpapa
whatsNew.feature1: Ngā huringa UI kua kitea aunoa
whatsNew.feature2: Ngā whakaahuatanga i hangaia e te AI

adminGuide.title: Aratohu Kaiwhakahaere
adminGuide.description: He aratohu katoa mō ngā kaiwhakahaere tūāpapa. Akohia me pēhea te whakahaere i ngā kaiwhakamahi, te aroturuki i ngā tātaritanga, me te whirihora i ngā tautuhinga pūnaha.
adminGuide.feature1: Tirohanga Whānui me ngā Tātaritanga o te Pūhara
adminGuide.feature3: Ngā Pūrongo Pūtea me ngā Moni Whiwhi

enterpriseGuide.title: Aratohu Pakihi
enterpriseGuide.description: He aratohu mā ngā kaiwhakahaere kamupene. Akohia te whakahaere i tō rōpū, te whakatū i ngā pūtake mātauranga, me te whakahaere i ngā whakaaetanga ihirangi.
enterpriseGuide.feature1: Te Whakahaere Tīma me ngā Pōwhiri

userGuide.title: Aratohu Kaiwhakamahi
userGuide.description: Ngā mea katoa e hiahiatia ana e koe hei waihanga, hei tātari, hei whakaputa ihirangi. He tino pai mō ngā kaihanga ihirangi me ngā kaihokohoko.
userGuide.feature1: Ngā Utauta Whakaputa Ihirangi me te AI

overview.intro: Hei kaiwhakahaere tūāpapa, kei a koe te urunga ki ngā taputapu whānui mō te aroturuki me te whakahaere i te tūāpapa Contentry katoa. Mā tēnei aratohu koe e āwhina ki te mārama ki ō pūkenga whakahaere.
overview.dashboardDesc: Mā te Papatohu Kaiwhakahaere ka kitea whānuitia ngā mahi me te hauora o te pūhara.
overview.feature1: Te aroturuki i ngā mahi a ngā kaiwhakamahi i te wā tūturu
overview.feature2: Ngā tātaritanga ihirangi puta noa i te tūāpapa
overview.feature3: Ngā inenga hauora me te mahi o te pūnaha
overview.feature4: Te urunga tere ki ngā mahi whakahaere nui
overview.tip: Tirohia te Papatohu Kaiwhakahaere i ia wā, kia mōhio tonu ai koe ki ngā au o te tūāpapa, kia kitea wawe ai hoki ngā take pea.

userManagement.intro: Ko te whakahaere kaiwhakamahi he mahi whakahaere matua e āhei ai koe ki te tirotiro i ngā kaiwhakamahi me ngā umanga katoa i runga i te tūāpapa.
userManagement.viewUsersTitle: Te Tirohanga me te Whakahaere i ngā Kaiwhakamahi
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Whakauru atu ki te wāhanga Whakahaere Kaiwhakamahi hei tiro, hei rapu, hei whakahaere hoki i ngā kaiwhakamahi pūhara katoa.
userManagement.feature1: Rapua me te tātari i ngā kaiwhakamahi mā te ingoa, īmēra, tūranga rānei
userManagement.feature2: Tirohia ngā kōtaha kaiwhakamahi taipitopito me te hītori mahi
userManagement.feature3: Whakarerekētia ngā tūranga me ngā whakaaetanga a ngā kaiwhakamahi
userManagement.feature4: Whakakorehia, mukua rānei ngā pūkete kaiwhakamahi ina hiahiatia
userManagement.rolesTitle: Te Mārama ki ngā Tūranga Kaiwhakamahi
userManagement.rolesDesc: E toru ngā tūranga matua a Contenty mō ngā kaiwhakamahi:
userManagement.role1: Kaiwhakahaere: Te urunga katoa ki te papaaho me ngā āheinga whirihoranga pūnaha
userManagement.role2: Kaiwhakahaere Hinonga: Whakahaere i te tīma me ngā tautuhinga o tā rātou kamupene
userManagement.role3: Kaiwhakamahi: Ngā āhuatanga hanga me te tātari ihirangi paerewa
userManagement.warning: Me manatoko tonu te pānga i mua i te whakarerekē i ngā tūranga kaiwhakamahi, i te muku rānei i ngā pūkete. Tērā pea ka pā ēnei mahi ki ngā rerengamahi a te tīma.

analytics.intro: Ka whakaratohia e ngā tātaritanga he māramatanga hōhonu ki te whakamahinga o te tūāpapa puta noa i ngā umanga me ngā kaiwhakamahi katoa.
analytics.metric1: Ngā kaiwhakamahi hohe katoa me ngā au tipu
analytics.metric2: Te rahinga o te waihanga me te tātari ihirangi
analytics.metric5: Ngā kaute tutuki i ngā whakaritenga me ngā kaute mōrearea puta noa i ngā umanga
analytics.tip: Kaweake i ngā pūrongo tātari mō ngā whakaaturanga a ngā kaipupuri hea mā te whakamahi i te āhuatanga Tikiake Pūrongo.

financials.intro: Mā te wāhanga Tirohanga Whānui Pūtea ka kitea ngā inenga moni whiwhi me ngā inenga ohaurunga o te tūāpapa.
financials.revenueTitle: Ngā Moni Whiwhi me ngā Ohaurunga
financials.revenueDesc: Aroturuki i te hauora pūtea me ngā ia ohaurunga puta noa i ngā umanga katoa.
financials.feature1: Te aroturuki i te moni whiwhi ā-marama (MRR)
financials.feature3: Te whakamahinga nama me te hītori hoko

systemConfig.intro: Mā te whirihoranga pūnaha ka taea e koe te whakahaere i ngā tautuhinga me ngā whakaurunga puta noa i te tūāpapa.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Whirihorahia me te aroturuki i ngā whakaurunga tuatoru:
systemConfig.integration1: API Ayrshare mō te whakaputa pāpāho pāpori
systemConfig.integration2: Ngā ratonga AI mō te whakaputa me te tātari ihirangi
systemConfig.tip: Whakamātauria ngā whakaurunga i roto i te taiao whakaaturanga i mua i te huri i ngā tautuhinga whakaputa.

gettingStarted.intro: Nau mai ki Contentry! Hei Kaiwhakahaere Pakihi, kei a koe ngā taputapu hei whakahaere i tō tīma, hei whakatū aratohu ihirangi, hei whakarite hoki i te ōritetanga o te waitohu.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Whāia ēnei mahi hei whakarite i tō pūkete umanga:
gettingStarted.step1: Whakatere ki Ngā Tautuhinga > Hinonga hei uru atu ki te papatohu o tō kamupene
gettingStarted.step2: Tukuatuhia ngā aratohu me ngā kaupapa here waitohu a tō kamupene ki te Pūtake Mātauranga
gettingStarted.step3: Karangatia ngā mema o tō rōpū, ka tohaina ngā tūranga e tika ana
gettingStarted.step4: Whirihorahia ngā rerengamahi whakaae mō te arotake ihirangi
gettingStarted.tip: Whakaotia te tatūnga o tō Pūtake Mātauranga i mua i te tono i ngā mema o te tīma kia mōhio ai rātou kei a rātou ngā aratohu waitohu mai i te rā tuatahi.

teamManagement.intro: Mā te whakahaere tīma whai hua ka maeneene te mahi tahi me te whakahaere urunga tika i roto i tō whakahaere.
teamManagement.inviteTitle: Te Pōwhiri i ngā Mema o te Tīma
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Tāpirihia he mema hou ki tō tīma hinonga:
teamManagement.feature1: Tāuruhia te wāhitau īmēra a te mema o te tīma
teamManagement.feature2: Tīpakohia tā rātou tūranga (Kaihanga, Kaiwhakahaere, Kaiwhakahaere rānei)
teamManagement.feature3: Tāpirihia he karere whaiaro whiriwhiri ki te pōwhiri
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Tautapahia ngā tūranga i runga i ngā kawenga:
teamManagement.role1: Kaihanga: Ka taea te waihanga me te tuku ihirangi hei whakaae
teamManagement.role2: Kaiwhakahaere: Ka taea te whakaae/whakakore i ngā ihirangi me te whakahaere i ngā kaihanga
teamManagement.role3: Kaiwhakahaere: Uru katoa ki te umanga tae atu ki te utu me ngā tautuhinga
teamManagement.tip: Ka pau te wā o ngā pōwhiri i muri i ngā rā e whitu. Whakamaharatia ngā mema o te tīma kia whakaae wawe ki ā rātou pōwhiri.

knowledgeBase.intro: Ko te Pūtake Mātauranga te putunga matua o tō kamupene mō ngā aratohu waitohu, ngā kaupapa here, me ngā ture ihirangi. Ko ngā tuhinga kua tukuna ake ki konei ka whakamōhio i ngā ihirangi i hangaia e te AI mō ngā mema katoa o te tīma.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Tāpirihia ngā tuhinga hei ārahi i te waihanga ihirangi:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Ngā aratohu momo waitohu me ngā aratohu reo
knowledgeBase.docType2: Ngā kaupapa here ture me ngā kaupapa here tutuki
knowledgeBase.docType4: Ngā ture motuhake mō te ahumahi
knowledgeBase.tip: Tukuna ake ō aratohu waitohu tino nui i te tuatahi. Ka whakatairangahia e te AI ngā tuhinga i roto i te Pūtake Mātauranga o te kamupene i ngā tukunga ake a ngā kaiwhakamahi takitahi.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Mā te tukanga whakaaetanga ka tutuki i ngā ihirangi katoa ngā paerewa a tō kamupene i mua i te whakaputanga.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Ka rere ngā ihirangi i roto i ēnei wāhanga:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Ka whakaputa, ka tātari rānei te kaihanga i ngā ihirangi
approvalWorkflow.step2: Ka tukuna ngā ihirangi hei whakaaetanga (mēnā e hiahiatia ana)
approvalWorkflow.step3: Arotake a te kaiwhakahaere, ā, ka tukuna he urupare
approvalWorkflow.step4: Ka taea te whakaputa i ngā ihirangi kua whakaaetia ki ngā papaaho pāpori
approvalWorkflow.warning: Whakahohehia ngā whakaritenga whakaaetanga i roto i ngā Tautuhinga kia mōhio ai ka arotakehia ngā ihirangi katoa i mua i te whakaputa.

billing.intro: Whakahaerehia tō ohaurunga pakihi me te aroturuki i te whakamahinga nama.
billing.subscriptionDesc: Kei roto i tō papatohu nama:
billing.feature1: Ngā taipitopito o te mahere o nāianei me te tohatoha nama
billing.feature2: Hītori whakamahinga me ngā whiwhinga e toe ana
billing.feature3: Hītori nama me ngā tikanga utu

adminUsersPage.title: Whakahaere Kaiwhakamahi
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Whakahaerehia ngā kaiwhakamahi puta noa i te tūāpapa
adminUsersPage.searchPlaceholder: Rapu mā te īmēra, mā te ingoa rānei...

toasts.deleteFailed: Kāore i taea te muku i te kaiwhakamahi

toasts.updateSuccess: Kua angitu te whakahōutanga o te kaiwhakamahi

adminUsersPage.deleteWarning: Kāore e taea te whakakore i tēnei mahi.

userDetails.title: Ngā Taipitopito Kaiwhakamahi
userDetails.currentPeriodEnd: Te Mutunga o te Wā o Nāianei

deleteModal.title: Mukua te Kaiwhakamahi
deleteModal.description: Ka mukua rawatia te kaiwhakamahi me ngā raraunga katoa e pā ana ki tēnei:
deleteModal.irreversible: Kāore e taea te whakakore i tēnei mahi.

gettingStarted.intro: Nau mai ki Contentry! Mā tēnei aratohu koe e āwhina ki te waihanga ihirangi whakahihiri, e tutuki ana i ngā whakaritenga mā te whakamahi i ngā taputapu e whakamahia ana e te AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Whakatūria tō kōtaha ki ngā mōhiohio tika
gettingStarted.step3: Waihangahia he Kōtaha Rautaki mō tō waitohu, mō tō kaupapa rānei
gettingStarted.tip: Tīmata ki tētahi Kōtaha Rautaki kia mau tonu ai te reo me te karere o ō ihirangi katoa.

contentCreation.intro: Mā te hanga ihirangi ā-AI a Contentry ka āwhina i a koe ki te waihanga pou whakahihiri i roto i ngā hēkona.
contentCreation.generateDesc: Waihangahia he ihirangi mā te whakamahi i te AI:
contentCreation.feature1: Whakauruhia he kaupapa, he tohu rānei e whakaahua ana i te mea e hiahia ana koe ki te tuku kōrero
contentCreation.feature2: Tīpakohia ō tūāpapa ūnga (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, me ētahi atu)
contentCreation.feature3: Kōwhiria te reo tuhituhi e pai ana ki a koe
contentCreation.feature4: Me whakaputa he whakaahua e haere tahi ana me koe
contentCreation.schedule1: Whakatūria ngā wātaka whakaputa ihirangi auau
contentCreation.schedule2: Kōwhiria ngā rā me ngā wā motuhake mō te tuku aunoa
contentCreation.schedule3: Whakahohehia te tuku aunoa, te arotake ā-ringa rānei i mua i te whakaputanga
contentCreation.tip: Whakamahia te pouaka taki 'Ihirangi Whakatairanga' i te wā e hanga ana i ngā pou hokohoko hei whakarite kia whai whakaaro te tātaritanga hanganga ture ki ngā aratohu whakatairanga.

analyzeContent.intro: Ka arotakehia e te āhuatanga Tātari Ihirangi ō ihirangi mō te tutuki i ngā whakaritenga, te aro ki ngā ahurea, me te hanganga o te waitohu.
analyzeContent.howToTitle: Me pēhea te tātari i ngā ihirangi
analyzeContent.step1: Whakatere ki te Whakaōrite Ihirangi > Tātarihia te Ihirangi
analyzeContent.step2: Whakapirihia ō ihirangi ki te wāhi tuhinga
analyzeContent.step3: Tīpakohia he Kōtaha Rautaki mō te horopaki
analyzeContent.step4: Pāwhiritia te Tātari hei whiwhi urupare taipitopito
analyzeContent.type1: Te whakatutuki i ngā kaupapa here me ngā aratohu a te kamupene
analyzeContent.type2: Te aro ki ngā ahurea puta noa i ngā rohe rerekē
analyzeContent.type3: Te ōritetanga o te reo me te reo o te waitohu
analyzeContent.type4: Ngā mōrearea me ngā taunakitanga pea
analyzeContent.tip: Tātarihia ngā ihirangi i ngā wā katoa i mua i te whakaputa ki ngā tūāpapa o waho, inā koa mō ngā kaupapa e aro ana ki ngā rohe maha.

strategicProfiles.intro: Mā ngā Kōtaha Rautaki e tautuhi te horopaki, te reo, me ngā aratohu mō te waihanga me te tātari ihirangi.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Tautuhia te hunga whakarongo me te kaupapa o te kōtaha
strategicProfiles.feature2: Whakatakotoria ngā whakaaro ahurea me ngā whakaaro ā-rohe
strategicProfiles.feature3: Tukuake i ngā tuhinga me ngā aratohu e pā ana ki te kōtaha
strategicProfiles.feature4: Whirihorahia ngā manakohanga oro me te kāhua taunoa
strategicProfiles.tip: Waihangahia he Kōtaha Rautaki motuhake mō ngā kaupapa rerekē, waitohu, mākete rohe rānei.

socialAccounts.intro: Honoa ō pūkete pāpāho pāpori ki te whakaputa ihirangi tika mai i a Contentry.
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Ngā whārangi Whaiaro me ngā whārangi Kamupene
socialAccounts.warning: Kia mau tonu ō hononga ki ō pūkete pāpori. Tērā pea ka āraia te whakaputanga o ngā pou kua whakaritea mēnā kua pau te wā.

approvalProcess.intro: Mena kua whakahohea ngā rerengamahi whakaae a tō hinonga, me arotake te ihirangi i mua i te whakaputa.
approvalProcess.step2: Pāwhiritia te 'Tukuna hei Whakaae' hei tuku atu ki tō kaiwhakahaere
approvalProcess.step3: Aroturuki i te tūnga whakaae i roto i te rarangi Whakaaetanga e tatari ana
approvalProcess.tip: Tāpirihia he tuhipoka ina tuku ihirangi ana hei hoatu i te horopaki ki ngā kaiarotake mō āu whakataunga auaha.

aboutGuide.title: Mō & Ngā Mahi Pai rawa atu
aboutGuide.description: Akohia te kaupapa o Contentry, ā, kitea ngā mahi pai hei arotau i tō waihanga ihirangi, ō utu waitohu, me ngā kōtaha kaiwhakatairanga.

sections.brandDeals: Ngā Tukunga Waitohu me ngā Hononga Mahi

whatIsContentry.intro: He tūāpapa matauranga ihirangi e whakamahia ana e te AI a Contentry, i hangaia hei āwhina i ngā kaihanga ihirangi, ngā kaihokohoko, me ngā umanga ki te waihanga, ki te tātari, me te whakaputa ihirangi e tutuki ana i ngā whakaritenga i te tauine nui. Ahakoa he kaiwhakatairanga takitahi koe, he wāhanga rānei o tētahi tīma hokohoko nui, ka whakangawari a Contentry i te rere o tō ihirangi.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: E whakapono ana mātou ki te whakamana i ngā kaihanga mā te whakamahi i ngā taputapu atamai hei whakarite kia rite ia ihirangi ki te waitohu, kia aro ki ngā tikanga ahurea, ā, kia tutuki hoki i ngā aratohu a te tūāpapa.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Te whakaputa ihirangi e whakamahia ana e te AI e rite ana ki te reo o tō waitohu
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Te tirotiro i ngā whakaritenga ture i te wā tūturu
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Te tātaritanga aro ki ngā ahurea mō ngā hunga whakarongo o te ao
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Ngā tukanga whakaae kua whakangawaritia mō ngā tīma hinonga
whatIsContentry.tip: Ka whakakotahi a Contentriry i te mana o te AI me te tirotiro a te tangata ki te tuku ihirangi e pārekareka ana ki tō hunga whakarongo me te pupuri tonu i ngā ture.

keyFeatures.intro: Ka whakaratohia e Contentry he huinga taputapu whānui hei whakahaere i tō huringa ora katoa o te ihirangi:
keyFeatures.aiContentTitle: Te Waihanga Ihirangi e Mana Ana i te AI
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Waihangahia he ihirangi kounga teitei e hāngai ana ki tō waitohu me tō hunga whakarongo:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Te whakaputa ihirangi maha-pūhara (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Ngā oro tuhituhi ka taea te whakarite (Ngaio, Tūao, Whakaaweawe)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Te whakaputa whakaahua AI hei hoa mō ō pou
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Me whakarite kia tutuki i tō ihirangi ngā whakaritenga katoa i mua i te whakaputa:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Te tirotiro aunoa i ngā whakaritenga e pā ana ki ngā kaupapa here a te kamupene
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Te whakatauranga aro ki ngā ahurea mō ngā hunga mātakitaki o te ao
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Aromatawai mōrearea me ngā taunakitanga mahi
keyFeatures.tip: Whakamahia ngā Kōtaha Rautaki hei whakarite kia ōrite te reo waitohu puta noa i ngā ihirangi katoa kua hangaia.

bestPractices.intro: Mā te whai i ēnei tikanga pai ka āwhina i a koe ki te whakamahi i a Contentry me te waihanga i ngā ihirangi e whai hua ana:
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Mā te rerema mahi ōrite ka whakarite kia kounga me te whai hua:
bestPractices.workflow1: Tīmata mā te whakarite i tō Kōtaha Rautaki me ngā aratohu waitohu
bestPractices.workflow2: Waihangahia he ihirangi me te whakaaro ki tētahi tūāpapa me tētahi hunga whakarongo motuhake
bestPractices.workflow3: Tātarihia ngā ihirangi i ngā wā katoa i mua i te whakaputa ki ngā tūāpapa o waho
bestPractices.workflow4: Whakamahia ngā āhuatanga whakaritenga hei pupuri i te auau tuku kōrero ōrite
bestPractices.consistencyTitle: Kia mau tonu te pumau o te waitohu
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Mā te waitohu pumau ka hanga te whakawhirinaki me te mōhiotanga:
bestPractices.consistency1: Tukuatu tō aratohu momo waitohu ki te Pūtake Mātauranga
bestPractices.consistency2: Whakamahia te Kōtaha Rautaki kotahi mō ngā kaupapa e pā ana
bestPractices.consistency3: Arotakehia ngā ihirangi i hangaia e te AI kia tino ōrite ki tō reo
bestPractices.warning: Arotakehia ngā ihirangi i hangaia e te AI i mua i te whakaputa. Ahakoa te kaha o tā mātou AI, ko te tirotiro a te tangata ka whakarite i ngā hua pai rawa atu.

optimizeContent.intro: Ko te waihanga i ngā ihirangi pai he tīmatanga noa iho. Anei me pēhea te arotau kia nui rawa te whai wāhi:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: He motuhake ngā whakaritenga me ngā tumanakohanga a te hunga whakarongo o ia tūāpapa:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Arotahi ki ngā māramatanga ngaio, whakamahia ngā kupumatua ahumahi, whakaaetia te puka roa
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: He karere poto, he whakamahi rautaki i ngā tohu pae, he whai wāhi ki ngā kaupapa rongonui
optimizeContent.platform3: Pukamata: He pai te mahi a ngā ihirangi tirohanga, he whakatenatena i te whai wāhi a te hapori
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: He mea nui ngā whakaahua kounga teitei, whakamahia ngā tohu pae e tika ana, ngā kōrero hei whakauru atu
optimizeContent.engagement1: Tukuna he tuku kōrero i ngā wā tino pai mō tō hunga whakarongo
optimizeContent.engagement2: Whakamahia ngā karanga-ki-te-mahi whakahihiri i roto i ō ihirangi
optimizeContent.engagement3: Whakautu ki ngā kōrero me te whai wāhi atu ki tō hapori
optimizeContent.engagement4: Aroturuki i ngā tātaritanga kia mārama ai ko tēhea ihirangi te mea tino pai
optimizeContent.tip: Whakamahia te āhuatanga whakaritenga a Contetry hei tuku i ngā wā tino pai, me te kore e kaha ā-ringa.

brandDeals.intro: He nui te moni whiwhi mā te mahi tahi me ngā hoa mahi waitohu. Anei me pēhea te whakapai ake i tō huarahi:
brandDeals.preparationTitle: Te Whakarite mō ngā Hononga Waitohu
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Kia rite ina puta ngā whai wāhitanga:
brandDeals.prep1: Kia mau ki tētahi kohinga ihirangi ngaio, pumau hoki
brandDeals.prep2: Aroturukihia, whakaaturia hoki ō inenga whai wāhi
brandDeals.prep3: Hangaia he kete pāpāho me ō tatauranga me te whānuitanga o te hunga e toro atu ana ki a koe
brandDeals.prep4: Whakamahia a Contentry hei whakaputa tauira ariā ihirangi waitohu
brandDeals.pitch1: Whakaritehia tō whakatairanga ki ngā uara o te waitohu me te hunga whakarongo e hiahiatia ana
brandDeals.pitch2: Whakaratohia ngā whakaaro ihirangi motuhake kaua ki ngā tono whānui
brandDeals.pitch3: Whakaurua he tātaritanga tutuki i ngā whakaritenga hei whakaatu i te tutuki o ō ihirangi i ngā aratohu
brandDeals.tip: Whakamahia te tirotiro ture a Contentriry i te wā e hanga ana i ngā ihirangi tautoko hei whakarite kia tutukihia ngā whakaritenga whakaaturanga a te FTC me te tūāpapa.

influencerProfiles.intro: Ko tō Kōtaha Rautaki te tūāpapa o tō rautaki ihirangi. Anei me pēhea te arotau:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Mā te kōtaha kua whirihorahia pai ka whakarite kia ōrite, kia rite ki te waitohu ngā ihirangi:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Tautuhia mārama tō kaupapa motuhake me tō hunga whakarongo
influencerProfiles.setup2: Whakatakotoria tō reo me tō momo tuhituhi e pai ana ki a koe
influencerProfiles.setup3: Tāpirihia ngā whakaaro ahurea me ngā whakaaro ā-rohe mō tō hunga whakarongo
influencerProfiles.setup4: Tukuake ngā tuhinga tohutoro e whakaatu ana i te reo o tō waitohu
influencerProfiles.optimizeTitle: Te Arotau i te Mahi o te Kōtaha
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Whakapai tonu i tō kōtaha kia pai ake ai ngā hua:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Arotakehia ngā ihirangi kua hangaia, ā, whakarerekētia ngā tautuhinga kōtaha ina hiahiatia
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Waihangahia he maha ngā kōtaha mō ngā kaupapa rerekē, mō ngā hunga whakarongo rerekē rānei
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Kia mau tonu tō Pūtake Mātauranga ki ngā aratohu waitohu hou
influencerProfiles.tip: Arotakehia tō Kōtaha Rautaki ia toru marama kia tino whakaata ai i tō waitohu me tō hunga whakarongo e whanake haere ana.

workflowsGuide.title: Ngā Rerenga Mahi me te Aratohu Kaute
workflowsGuide.description: Akohia te mahi a te pūnaha whakatauranga, me te mārama ki ia taahiraa tukanga mai i te tātari ihirangi ki te whakaaetanga.
workflowsGuide.feature1: Te Whakamārama i te Pūnaha Kaute
workflowsGuide.feature2: Tātarihia te Rerenga Mahi o te Ihirangi

scoring.intro: Mā te pūnaha whakatauranga i roto i te Contentry ka whakaratohia he whakatauranga mārama, e ahu mai ana i ngā whiu, hei āwhina i a koe ki te mārama ki te mahi a tō ihirangi. Ka tīmata ngā whakatauranga katoa i te 100, ā, ka tangohia ngā tohu mō ngā takahi ture, ngā take rānei kua kitea.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Ko te kaute whānui he huinga taumaha o ngā āhuatanga tātari katoa, mai i te 0 ki te 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Tino pai - Kua rite ki te whakaputa, kua tino arotauhia te ihirangi
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Pai - He iti ngā whakapainga i tūtohutia i mua i te whakaputanga
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Me Aro - Me Arotake me ngā Whakahoutanga
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Kua tohua - Ngā take nui, kaua e whakaputaina kia whakatauhia rā anō
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Ka whakamahia e te kaute whānui te taumaha urutau i runga i te taumata mōrearea:
scoring.overallCalc2: Te Mōrearea Nui (Te Whakatutukitanga ≤60): (Te Whakatutukitanga × 50%) + (Ahurea × 30%) + (Te Tika × 20%)
scoring.overallCalc4: Mōrearea Tino Hira (Ture ≤40): Ko te kaute whānui he 40 te mōrahi
scoring.componentsDesc: Ka tatauhia tō kaute whānui mai i ngā wāhanga matua e toru mā te whakamahi i tētahi pūnaha whiu:
scoring.component1: Kaute Whakatutukitanga: Ka tīmata i te 100, ka tangohia ngā tohu mō ia takahi i kitea
scoring.component2: Kaute Aromatawai Ahurea: Te toharite o ngā taha ahurea e 6 a Hofstede
scoring.component3: Kaute Tika: Ka tīmata i te 100, ka tangohia ngā tohu mō ia hapa, mō ia take rānei i kitea
scoring.complianceDetailTitle: Kaute Whakatutukitanga (I runga i te Whiu)
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Ka tīmata ia pou me te Kaute Whakatutukitanga o te 100. Ka tangohia ngā tohu mō ia takahi ture:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Takahitanga Tino Raru (-60 ngā tohu): Takahitanga NDA, whakaaturanga mōhiohio muna → Mōrearea whakamutu tonu
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Takahi Nui (-40 ngā tohu): Whakatoi, whakahāwea, kōrero kino → Mōrearea mahi ture
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Te Takahi Teitei (-25 ngā tohu): Te ngaro o te whakaaturanga pānuitanga, te takahi kaupapa here → Ngā whiu/mōrearea whakatārewatanga
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Takahi Waenga (-10 ngā tohu): Reo koretake, he iti noa te rerekētanga o te aratohu → Whakangungu/whakatūpato
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Tauira: Ngaro te #ad (-25) + Take oro (-10) = Kaute whakamutunga o te 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: He maha ngā takahi ture e whakarārangihia ana - ka whakamahia ngātahitia ia whiu
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Ngā takahi i tirohia: Ngā mōhiohio muna, Te whakatoi, Te takahi i te NDA, Te whakaaturanga ngaro, Te takahi i te kaupapa here, Te reo koretake
scoring.culturalDetailTitle: Kaute Ahurea (Ngā Ahurea e 6 a Hofstede)
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Ko te kaute ahurea te toharite o ngā āhuatanga ahurea e ono o Hofstede (0-100 ia):
scoring.culturalDim1: Te Tawhiti Mana: Te whakatakotoranga, te whakaute i te mana whakahaere, te ōritetanga, te reo ngāwari
scoring.culturalDim2: Takitahi vs. Whakakotahitanga: Te arotahi ki 'Au/Au' vs. Te arotahi ki te hapori 'Tātou/Tātou'
scoring.culturalDim3: Te Tāne me te Wahinetanga: Te reo whakataetae/kaha me te reo mahi tahi/whakaae
scoring.culturalDim4: Te karo i te koretake: Ngā ture, te haumaru, te whakanui i te māramatanga, me te tuwhera ki te koretake
scoring.culturalDim5: Te Aronga mō te Wā Roa: Te arotahi ki ngā utu ā muri ake nei, me ngā hua mō te wā poto
scoring.culturalDim6: Te Whakangawari vs. Te Whakaiti: Te Hihiri/Te Ngākau Harikoa vs. Te Reo Ātaahua/Te Reo Whakahaere
scoring.culturalCalc: Kaute Ahurea = (Tapeke o ngā kaute ahu-6) ÷ 6
scoring.culturalRisk: Ina heke te Kaute Ahurea ki raro iho i te 50, ka whakamahia te taumaha 'Mōrearea Rongonui' hei tiaki i tō waitohu puta noa i te ao.
scoring.accuracyDetailTitle: Kaute Tika (I runga i te Whiu)
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Ka tīmata ia pou me te Kaute Tika o te 100. Ka tangohia ngā tohu mō ngā take i kitea:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: He Hē/He Kōrero Hē (-40 ngā tohu): Ngā kereme teka, ngā raraunga tito noa
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Pūtake Kore-Pono (-20 pts): Ngā kereme mai i ngā pūtake pono
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Kereme Kāore e Manatokohia (-10 pts): Ngā kōrero kāore e taea te tirotiro i ngā meka
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Tauira: Kereme teka (-40) + Pūtake kāore i manatokohia (-20) = Kaute whakamutunga o te 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: He maha ngā take e whakaemihia ana - ka whakamahia ngātahitia ia whiu
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Ka tohua aunoatia ngā ihirangi i runga i ngā hua tātaritanga:
scoring.flag1: He pai te kapinga (Kākāriki): Ngā kaute neke atu i te 80 - kua rite ki te whakaputa
scoring.flag2: Me Aroturuki (Kōwhai): Ngā Kaute 60-79 - me whakapai ake i ngā mea iti
scoring.flag3: Kua tohua mō te Arotake (Karaka): Ngā Kaute 40-59 - me arotake i mua i te whakaputanga
scoring.flag4: Ngā Take Tino Hira (Whero): Ngā kaute i raro i te 40 - kaua e whakaputaina kia whakatauhia rā anō
scoring.disclosureDesc: Mō ngā ihirangi whakatairanga, ka tirohia hoki e te pūnaha:
scoring.disclosure1: He Whakatairanga: Ka kitea mēnā he pānuitanga, he tautokona rānei te ihirangi
scoring.disclosure2: He Whakaaturanga: Tirohia ngā whakaaturanga tika mō te #pānui, te #tautoko, te mahi tahi rānei
scoring.disclosure3: Te Whakatutukitanga ā-Rohe: Manatoko i ngā whakaritenga whakaaturanga a te FTC (US), EU, me Nōwei
scoring.disclosure4: Ka puta he Takahitanga Teitei (-25 ngā tohu) i runga i te Kaute Whakatutukitanga mēnā ka ngaro te whakaaturanga
scoring.tip: Ka tatauhia anō ngā kaute i ia wā ka tātarihia ngā ihirangi. Whakamahia te āhuatanga Tuhituhi Anō hei whakapai ake aunoa i ngā ihirangi iti te kaute, me te pupuri tonu i tō karere.

analyze.intro: Mā te tukanga mahi Tātari Ihirangi koe e āwhina ki te aromatawai i ngā ihirangi o nāianei mō te tutuki i ngā whakaritenga, te aro ki ngā ahurea, me te kounga i mua i te whakaputa.
analyze.stepsTitle: Me pēhea te tātari i ngā ihirangi
analyze.stepsDesc: Whāia ēnei mahi hei tātari i tō ihirangi:
analyze.step1: Whakatere ki te Matauranga Ihirangi > ripa Tātari Ihirangi
analyze.step2: Whakapirihia, patohia rānei ō ihirangi ki te wāhi tuhinga
analyze.step3: Tīpakohia he Kōtaha Rautaki hei whakamahi i ngā aratohu o tō waitohu
analyze.step4: Me whiriwhiri koe ki te tīpako i te 'Hangaia he whakaahua e haere tahi ana' mēnā e hiahia ana koe kia hangaia e te AI he tirohanga
analyze.step5: Pāwhiritia te 'Tātari' hei whakahaere i te tātaritanga katoa
analyze.type1: Tirotiro Whakatutukitanga: Manatokohia ngā ihirangi e ai ki ngā kaupapa here me ngā ture o te tūāpapa (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Te Tairongo Ahurea: Ka matawai mō ngā ihirangi pea ka whakahē, ka kore rānei e pā ki te ahurea
analyze.type3: Manatoko Tika: Ka tirohia ngā kereme me ngā meka mō te tika
analyze.type4: Te Whakaritenga Waitohu: Ka whakataurite i ngā ihirangi ki ō aratohu Kōtaha Rautaki
analyze.tip: Whakamahia te pātene 'Tuhituhia Anō' hei whakapai ake aunoa i ngā ihirangi kei raro iho i te 70 ngā kaute. Ka aro te AI ki ngā take kua tohua, me te pupuri tonu i tō karere.

generate.intro: Ka whakamahia e te tukanga mahi Whakaputa Ihirangi te AI hei waihanga ihirangi hou i runga i tō kaupapa, i ngā whakaritenga o te tūāpapa, me ngā aratohu waitohu.
generate.stepsTitle: Me pēhea te hanga i ngā ihirangi
generate.step1: Whakatere ki te Maramaramatanga Ihirangi > ripa Whakaputa Ihirangi
generate.step2: Whakauruhia tō kaupapa, whakaahuahia rānei te mea e hiahia ana koe ki te waihanga
generate.step3: Tīpakohia tō tūāpapa ūnga me te reo tuhituhi
generate.step4: Kōwhiria he Kōtaha Rautaki mō te ōritetanga o te waitohu
generate.step5: Pāwhiritia te 'Whakaputa' hei waihanga ihirangi e whakamahia ana e te AI
generate.optionsDesc: Whakaritehia ō ihirangi kua hangaia mā te whakamahi i ēnei kōwhiringa:
generate.option1: Kōwhiringa Pūhara: Kōwhiria tētahi, ētahi rānei o ngā pūhara (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Te Reo Tuhituhi: Kōwhiria mai i te Ngaio, te Tūroa, te Whakaaweawe, te Whakamōhio rānei
generate.option3: Te Roa o te Ihirangi: Whakatikatikahia te roa e hiahiatia ana mō tō ihirangi
generate.option4: Te Whakaputa Whakaahua: Tahuri ki te waihanga i tētahi whakaahua i hangaia e te AI
generate.tip: Ka tātarihia aunoatia ngā ihirangi kua hangaia i muri i te hanganga. Arotakehia ngā kaute, ā, whakamahia ngā pātene urupare hei hanga anō mēnā e tika ana.

schedulePrompt.intro: Mā te Whakatairanga Whakarite ka taea e koe te whakarite i te whakaputa ihirangi aunoa e rere ana i ngā wā kua tohua, kia kī tonu ai tō maramataka ihirangi me te kore e wawao ā-ringa.
schedulePrompt.howToTitle: Te Whakatū i ngā Tohutohu Kua Whakaritea
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Waihangahia ngā tohu e whakaputa aunoa ana i ngā ihirangi:
schedulePrompt.step1: Waihangahia tō tohu whakaputa ihirangi me te kaupapa me ngā manakohanga
schedulePrompt.step2: Tautuhia te auau o te hōtaka (ia rā, ia wiki, ia rā motuhake rānei)
schedulePrompt.step3: Kōwhiria te wā e tika ana kia hangaia ai ngā ihirangi
schedulePrompt.step4: Whakahohehia te 'Tātari-Aunoa' hei whakahaere aunoa i te tātaritanga i runga i ngā ihirangi kua hangaia
schedulePrompt.benefitsTitle: Ngā Painga o ngā Tohutohu Kua Whakaritea
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Kia mau tonu te tuku pānui me te kore e mahi ā-ringa i ia rā
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Waihangahia he ihirangi i ngā hāora auaha tino pai
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Hangaia he rārangi ihirangi hei arotake me te whakaae
schedulePrompt.tip: Mā ngā tohutohu kua whakaritea ka puta he ihirangi mō ō tauira. Arotakehia, ā, whakaaetia i mua i te whakaputanga kia pai ai te kounga.

schedulePost.intro: Mā te Schedule Post ka taea e koe te whakarārangi i ngā ihirangi kua whakaaetia mō te whakaputa aunoa i ngā wā tino pai puta noa i ō papaaho pāpāho pāpori hono.
schedulePost.howToTitle: Me pēhea te whakarite i ngā pou
schedulePost.step1: Mai i tētahi tirohanga ihirangi, pāwhiritia te 'Whakarite' kaua ko te 'Whakaputa Inaianei'
schedulePost.step2: Tīpakohia te rā me te wā e hiahiatia ana mō te whakaputa
schedulePost.step3: Kōwhiria ko ēhea ngā papaaho pāpori hono hei whakaputa ki
schedulePost.step4: Whakaūtia, tāpirihia hoki ki tō rarangi kua whakaritea
schedulePost.option1: Wā Motuhake: Kōwhiria he rā me te wā tika mō te whakaputa
schedulePost.option2: Te Wā Pai: Tukua te AI ki te whakaaro i ngā wā tuku pai rawa atu i runga i ngā raraunga whai wāhi
schedulePost.option3: Pūhara Maha: Whakaritea ngā ihirangi kotahi puta noa i ngā pūhara maha i te wā kotahi
schedulePost.warning: Me whai pūkete pāpāho pāpori hono kotahi te iti rawa mō ngā pou kua whakaritea. Honoa ngā pūkete ki Ngā Tautuhinga > Ngā Kōtaha Pāpori.

approval.intro: Mā te Rerenga Mahi Whakaae ka whakarite i te kounga o ngā ihirangi mā te tono kia arotakehia e te kaiwhakahaere i mua i te whakaputanga. He mea nui rawa tēnei mō ngā tīma hinonga me ngā ahumahi kua whakahaeretia.
approval.processDesc: Te nekehanga o te ihirangi i roto i te tukanga whakaae:
approval.step1: Ka tukuna e te kaihanga ngā ihirangi mā te pāwhiri i te 'Tukuna hei Whakaae'
approval.step2: Ka puta te ihirangi i roto i te Rārangi Whakaae a te kaiwhakahaere
approval.step3: Ka arotakehia e te kaiwhakahaere ngā ihirangi, ngā kaute, me ngā hua tātari
approval.step4: Ka whakaaetia, ka tono huringa, ka whakakahore rānei te kaiwhakahaere i te ihirangi
approval.status1: Tauira: Kei te mahihia te ihirangi, kāore anō kia tukuna
approval.status2: Kei te tatari kia whakaaetia: Kua tukuna, ā, e tatari ana kia arotakehia e te kaiwhakahaere
approval.status3: Kua whakaaetia: Kua rite ki te whakaputa, ki te whakarite rānei
approval.status4: Me Whakatikatika: I tono te kaiwhakahaere kia hurihia - tirohia te urupare ka tukuna anō
approval.tip: Tāpirihia he tuhipoka ina tuku ihirangi ana hei hoatu i te horopaki ki ngā kaiarotake mō āu whakataunga auaha. Mā tēnei ka tere ake te tukanga whakaae.

gdpr.weValuePrivacy: E whakanuia ana e mātou tō tūmataitinga
gdpr.cookieDescription: Ka whakamahia e mātou ngā pihikete hei whakapai ake i tō wheako tirotiro, hei tuku ihirangi whaiaro, hei tātari hoki i ā mātou manuhiri. Mā te pāwhiri i te "Whakaae Katoa", ka whakaae koe ki tā mātou whakamahinga o ngā pihikete. Ka taea e koe te whakarite i ō manakohanga, te whakakore rānei i ngā pihikete kāore e tino hiahiatia.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: E hiahiatia ana mō te manatoko, te haumarutanga, me ngā mahi taketake. Kāore e taea te whakakore.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Āwhina mai kia mārama mātou ki te taunekeneke a ngā manuhiri ki tā mātou tūāpapa hei whakapai ake i ā mātou ratonga.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Whakamahia hei tuku pānuitanga whaiaro me te ine i te whai huatanga o te kaupapa.
